forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High around 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High around 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain developing later in the day. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 58F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Thunder possible. Low 53F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 58F. E winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 63F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
